wikipedia_page.main: Delyth Evans born 17 March 1958, Cardiff was the Labour National Assembly for Wales member for Mid and West Wales between 2000 and 2003.

link_mentions.page: Mid and West Wales (Senedd electoral region)
response: |2000Alun Michael resigned in May 2000 and was replaced by Delyth Evans.

response: Politicians: Jon Owen Jones MP, Bethan Jenkins AM, Delyth Evans former AM, and Dafydd Trystan Davies, former Chief Executive of Plaid Cymru.
